fullText: Theodotus of Ancyra https://gedsh.bethmardutho.org/Theodotus-of-Ancyra http://syriaca.org/bibl/561 552 http://syriaca.org/person/786 person Greek author and bp. of Ancyra; author of a work against Nestorius that survives in Syriac translation. ( fl. first half of 5th cent. ) Greek author and bp. of Ancyra. His work against Nestorius in dialogue form ( CPG 6131), lost in Greek, is partly preserved in Syriac translation in ms. Brit. Libr. Add. 17,148 of the 7th cent. (unedited); of the three books, the first is lost, and the second not quite complete. Two of his homilies, both on the Nativity ( CPG 6125–6), were also translated into Syriac and are included in the two large homiliaries in the Syr. Orth. Patriarchate, 12/18 and 12/19, both dated 1001. Sources CPG 6124–6141. A.  Van Roey, ‘Le florilège nestorien dans le ‘Traité contre Nestorius de Théodote d’Ancyre’, Studia Patristica 12 (= TU 115, 1975), 155–9. A.  Van Roey idem , ‘Le florilège de l’Adversus Nestorium de Cyrille d’Alexandrie et du Traité contre Nestorius de Théodote d’Ancyre’, in Überlieferungsgeschichtliche Untersuchungen, Überlieferungsgeschichtliche Untersuchungen , ed. F. Paschke ( TU 125, 1981), 573–8. Sebastian P. Brock
